casebody.data:
IN RE: Scott W. MCQUAIG NO. 2019-B-0308 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 6, 2019

ORDER

Considering the Joint Petition for Interim Suspension filed by respondent, Scott W. McQuaig, and the Office of Disciplinary Counsel,

IT IS ORDERED that Scott W. McQuaig, Louisiana Bar Roll number 1945, be and he hereby is suspended from the practice of law on an interim basis pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 19.3, pending further orders of this court. Pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 26(E), this order is effective immediately.
